attributes.title: Full of homophobes
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to find many open arms to the LGBTQ+ community as Donald Trump stated in one of his rallies. Only to find a bunch of angry white people with guns and confederate flags confused saying to make America great again when it was great when Obama was president, they probably just want Obama back.

attributes.title: Disgusted.
attributes.review: Donald Trump has proven time and time again that he is not fit to be president for ALL people in this country. His appeal to Christians amazes me, as he clearly uses the Bible as a prop to gain the Christian vote. His rhetoric encourages white supremacy and nationalist ideals that are a danger to society if widely accepted. Stop idolizing this man and take a hard look at his tactics that gaslight the American people.
